attributes.action: We want Mo Farah knighted for his exceptional services to sport
attributes.background: Mo Farah is an inspiration to all in the world and UK. He has shown that with talent hard work and ambition anything can be achieved

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  
 
Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
